name: ❄️ⓟⓤⓡⓡⓘⓣⓨ ❄️ Snow White Virgin
bio: Aloha! I'm ❄️ⓟⓤⓡⓡⓘⓣⓨ ❄️ Snow White Virgin. I'm a Culinary Sanitation Specialist by day, and I like braiding people's hair by night. It's not common knowledge, but my ancestry connects me to Confucius. Our friendship will be ridiculous, prickly, and full of wet food.
